original_text: The Reubenites and Gadites, who had very large herds and flocks, saw that the lands of Jazer and Gilead were suitable for livestock.
korean_text: 르우벤 자손과 갓 자손은 심히 많은 가축 떼를 가졌더라 그들이 야셀 땅과 길르앗 땅을 본즉 그 곳은 목축할 만한 장소인지라

sentences.original_text: who had very large herds and flocks
sentences.korean_translation: 매우 큰 가축 떼를 가지고 있었는데

sentences.original_text: the lands of Jazer and Gilead
